entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve negation of relational patterns with numeric values in refactorings #64558
  • Don't infer a val escape on 'out scoped var' #64556
  • NFW reduction in external and internal releases #64550
    17.5 P1
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64549
    17.5
  • Unexpected value 'include' in azure-pipelines-integration.yml #64548
  • Telemetry to measure configuration switch actions in the language service #64547
    17.5 P1
  • `CSharpStructuredTriviaFormatEngine` should probably derive from `CSharpFormatEngine` instead of `AbstractFormatEngine` #64546
  • Fix up integration tests and make it required in PR validation #64545
    17.5 P1
  • Inline rename UI navigation from keyboard bugs #64544
    17.5 P1
  • DotNetSdkTests.TestDiscoverEditorAndGlobalConfigFilesCanBeDisabled is flaky #64542
  • Semantic snippets tests for razor integration #64541
    17.5 P1
  • Add functionality to code snippets to both be able to reference a different replacement and to then execute arbitrary logic on that replacement value #64540
  • C# go to implementation feature lists unsuitable implementations #64538
  • Completion insert `=` where it is not necessary #64531
    17.5
  • False positive CS8602 warning #64525

Closed

  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 #61463
    17.4
  • Remove `AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsNumericIntPtr` once we add `TargetFramework.Net70` #61235
    17.5
  • VS refactor suggests an incorrect pattern matching for `!(a?b is true | false)` #64292
    Backlog
  • LSIF Generator cannot be run on non-windows machines. #64510
  • Intellisense does not recognize start of string, changes "D: to "Date: #64280
    Backlog
  • [bug] VSCode crashing with large XML and Markdown files. #64534
  • Formatting: no setting for spacing after target-typed new keyword, default formatting conflicts with StyleCop's SA1000 #64509
  • Error CS1508 is not pointing to Microsoft doc page #63515
  • Add the title, category and description fields into build diagnostics reported in error list #57377
    17.3
  • Ensure diagnostics from build are hookued up to the descriptor properties #47345
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33005.318 #64527
  • Missing ref safety error inside `foreach` #64218
    17.4
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64236
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Build and run tests on .NET 7 #64560
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update publish data to test PR validation fix #64559
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't wait solution crawler in code action test #64557
    Area-IDE
  • Beef up resiliency of DeclareAsNullable fixer #64555
    Area-IDE
  • Publish pr validation packages #64554
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix regex detection for StringSyntax attribute on params parameters #64553
    Area-IDE
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove assert that fires for old CodeStyle NuGet packages #64532
    Area-IDE
  • Take over test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Wait application idle in navigate to test #64524
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix negation of is true and is false patterns with non-Boolean values #64520
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add and use TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Only start scanning for task-list items once the Task-List window is actually open. #64543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create a .NET Core build of the LSIF generator #64521
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Replace recursion with iteration in convert-if-to-switch #64537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64539
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky, Next
  • Remove unneeded `#pragma warning disable` #64535
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64533
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64528
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64526
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64522
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE
  • Simpler bidirectional streaming invocation in OOP. #64494
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build #64055
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • Support generated-only symbols in SymbolFinder #63377
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
